CustomField.formula:
IF( last_years_event__c <> null,
HYPERLINK("https://erepublic.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Report/00O1O0000088cuuUAA/view?fv0=" &
SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(Name, " ", "%20"), "'", "%27"), ",", "%2C") &
"&fv1=" & SUBSTITUTE( last_years_event__r.Name , " ", "%20") &
"&fv2=" & SUBSTITUTE( Days_Since_Last_Event__c , " ", "%20"), "Today"),null) &
IF(AND( last_years_event__c <> null, Standardized_Event_Name__c <> null ), " | ", null) &
IF( AND( Standardized_Event_Name__c <> null, last_years_event__c <> null ),
HYPERLINK("https://erepublic.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Report/00OJw00000A0pzFMAR/view?fv0=" &
SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(SUBSTITUTE(Standardized_Event_Name__c, " ", "%20"), "'", "%27"), ",", "%2C"), "12 weeks"),null)
CustomField.label: Registration Y/Y
